meanings.sent1: The towel felt dampness after being left out in the rain.
meanings.sent2: The grass was covered in a layer of dampness from the morning dew.
meanings.sent3: The dampness on the windows made funny shapes when the sun shone through.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement was like a wave of dampness, spreading slowly but surely.
meanings.sent5: The dampness of the soil made it perfect for planting new seeds.

meanings.sent1: The basement had a musty smell due to the dampness in the air.
meanings.sent2: She could feel the dampness seeping through her clothes as she walked in the rain.
meanings.sent3: The dampness of the cake made it collapse in the middle, creating a funny shape.
meanings.sent4: The dampness of the forest enveloped her like a comforting blanket.
meanings.sent5: The dampness of the cave walls glistened in the dim light, creating an eerie atmosphere.
